    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Sequence.Base
      This enumeration is used to hold the char and color asociated with each base, and to provide methods to convert a char to base and vice versa.

    • Method Detail

      • generator

        public static Sequence generator(int length)
        Creates a new Sequence object with a random sequence of the specified length.
        Parameters:
        length - the number of bases in the new sequence.
        Returns:
        the generated Sequence instance.

      • generateFixedSizedFragments

        public java.util.List<Sequence> generateFixedSizedFragments(int uniqueLength,
                                                            int minOverlapping,
                                                            int maxOverlapping)
        Breaks down the sequence into fixed sized fragments, plus start and end sequences that overlap with the previous and next fragments. These overlapping parts are of a variable length, which is determined at random within a given range.
        Parameters:
        uniqueLength - the length in number of bases of the sequence region which is unique to each fragment. Every fragment has the same unique region length.
        minOverlapping - the overlapping region's minimum length.
        maxOverlapping - the overlapping region's maximum length.
        Returns:
        a List of Sequence, every member of the list is a fragment that includes the unique region and the two overlapping regions.

        Returns:
